backend/main.mo: Motoko backend actor managing user profiles, shop items, carts, purchases, and website/UPI config with access‑controlled queries and mutations.
frontend-file-summaries.txt: Text file containing pre-written summaries of frontend source files.
frontend/index.css: Tailwind base stylesheet defining CSS variables for light/dark themes and global styles.
frontend/index.html: Basic HTML entry point mounting the React app and loading main.tsx.
frontend/src/App.tsx: Main React entry configuring router, theme provider, aggressive React Query caching, lazy-loaded pages, and dynamic title updates.
frontend/src/components/CheckoutModal.ts: Purchase modal handling account info entry, UPI QR generation, and payment completion.
frontend/src/components/Footer.tsx: Footer showing copyright, caffeine.ai link, and secure UPI payments text.
frontend/src/components/Header.tsx: Header with navigation, Internet Identity login/logout, cart count, and responsive mobile menu.
frontend/src/components/Layout.tsx: Layout wrapper applying natural scroll and rendering header, outlet, and footer.
frontend/src/hooks/useActor.ts: Creates and manages a backend actor based on Internet Identity and auto‑invalidates dependent queries.
frontend/src/hooks/useInternetIdentity.t: Provides Internet Identity context, login handling, and identity persistence via AuthClient.
frontend/src/hooks/useNaturalScroll.ts: Implements global natural scroll behavior for wheel and touch inputs with skip logic for scrollable elements.
frontend/src/hooks/useQueries.ts: React Query hooks for admin checks, shop items, UPI config, website config, and mutations using the backend actor.
frontend/src/index.css: Tailwind base styles and theme variables with performance and accessibility optimizations.
frontend/src/main.tsx: Bootstraps React app with QueryClientProvider and InternetIdentityProvider.
frontend/src/pages/DiscordPage.tsx: Displays Discord invite page using website config and styled UI components.
frontend/src/pages/HistoryPage.tsx: Displays the user's purchase history with status badges, timestamps, and item details, handling loading and empty states.
frontend/src/pages/HomePage.tsx: Renders the homepage with server status, tagline, feature cards, and navigation buttons, using config-loaded data.
frontend/src/pages/NotFoundPage.tsx: Simple 404 page showing an error message and a button linking back to the home page.
frontend/src/pages/ShopPage.tsx: Main shop interface allowing category filtering, cart management, checkout, and item browsing with memoized components.
frontend/src/pages/VotePage.tsx: Displays voting links for the server, using config-defined URLs when available and showing a loading state.
frontend/src/utils/urlParams.ts: Utility functions for reading, storing, and clearing URL and session parameters, including hash-based parsing.
frontend/tailwind.config.js: Tailwind CSS configuration extending theme colors, animations, and plugins for typography, container queries, and animations.
project_state.json: Defines project metadata and notes a fix request to improve website performance in both preview and editor. Lists performance issues and a pending feature request focused on optimization.
